mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CONCAT(A.pm_no, A.pm_status, B.ro_no, B.ro_name, B.ro_address, B.ro_detail_address, B.ro_postcode)) FROM tbl_place_member A LEFT JOIN tbl_room B ON A.ro_no = B.ro_no WHERE A.pm_status NOT IN ( '폐업', '탈퇴' )

SELECT A.pm_no, A.pm_status, B.ro_no, B.ro_name, B.ro_address, B.ro_detail_address, B.ro_postcode FROM tbl_place_member A LEFT JOIN tbl_room B ON A.ro_no = B.ro_no WHERE A.pm_status NOT IN ( '폐업', '탈퇴', '대기' ) LIMIT 0, #{skip}

SELECT A.pm_no, A.pm_status, B.ro_no, B.ro_name, B.ro_address, B.ro_detail_address, B.ro_postcode, C.se_no, C.se_name, C.se_manager, C.se_phone, C.se_address, C.se_status FROM tbl_place_member A LEFT JOIN tbl_room B ON A.ro_no = B.ro_no LEFT JOIN tbl_seller C ON A.pm_no = C.pm_no LEFT JOIN tbl_product D ON C.se_no = D.se_no WHERE C.se_status NOT IN ( '폐업', '탈퇴', '거부', '대기' ) AND A.pm_status NOT IN ( '폐업', '탈퇴' ) AND D.pr_status NOT IN ( 'INACTIVE', 'DELETE' ) AND A.pm_no = 1 GROUP BY A.pm_no, A.pm_status, B.ro_no, B.ro_name, B.ro_address, B.ro_detail_address, B.ro_postcode, C.se_no, C.se_name, C.se_manager, C.se_phone, C.se_address, C.se_status
